Trigger.Name: PriorityList (Move this up and down for prio)

Trigger.Description: Refer to the following link for instructions on how to setup, test, and modify the triggers. Triggers must be in Local Triggers folder to modify. https://github.com/KingPendragoon/JobPrioGaolTelesto/blob/main/README.md

Action.Description: Send keycode (32) "Space" to window (Final Fantasy XIV)

Trigger.Name: Auto Sprint (Island Sanctuary)
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<x>You obtain a sack of island clay\.|You obtain an island stone\.|You obtain a sack of island sand\.)

Trigger.Name: Auto Crafter
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^12\||\|0(?:038\|\|(?:Macro #(?<macro>\d) finished|(?:ac|autocraft) (?:(?<par>reset|pause)|(?:limit )?(?<limit>\d+)|set (?<material>\d+)|macro (?:(?<macroType>individual) (?<macroID>[1-9]?\d)|(?<macroType>shared) (?<macroID>[1-9]?\d)|(?<macroType>snd) (?<macroID>.*)|(?<macroType>keybind) (?<macroID>[1-9]))(?:\|[^\|]*)?$))|03C\||8(?:3C\||B0\|\|(?:You lose the effect of ..(?<regex>Well Fed|Medicated|Squadron Spiritbonding Manual|That Which Binds Us)\.|.*(?<regex>|||))|42\|\|(?:.+(?<regex>||)|(?<regex>You begin synthesizing|Your synthesis fails!|You successfully extract a))|39\|\|(?:.+(?<regex>)|(?<regex>Your spiritbond with the)|The condition of your.+ (?<regex>0%)|.*(?<regex>0%))|C2\|\|(?:.+(?<regex>)|(?<regex>You synthesize))))

Trigger.Name: Auto Fisher
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<x>You land (?:a|\d*)|You lose your bait\.\.\.|The fish gets away\.\.\.|You release)|(?<y>You suffer the effect of Inefficient Hooking\.)|(?<z>You recover from the effect of Inefficient Hooking\.)

Send keycode (50) "2" to window (Final Fantasy XIV)
Send keycode (49) "1" to window (Final Fantasy XIV)
Send keycode (50) "2" to window (Final Fantasy XIV)

Trigger.Name: Active Time Maneuver [Hades]
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<start>\|0839\|\|(?:The Light within Her champions grows faint\.\.\.|))|(?<stop>\|0044\|(?:Hades\|Has the Wardens' Light won free!\? No\.\.\.|\|))

Trigger.Name: MGP Tracker
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|.*\|(?:0039\|\|.*(?<cost>in play for the next match\.)|08be\|\|You obtain (?:(?<mgpGained>\d*)(?: \(\+15%\))? MGP\.|an? (?<cardName>.*) card\.)|003d\|(?<npcName>.*?)\||0038\|\|mgp (?<mgpInitial>\d*)$)

Action.Description: delete mgpFee variable if new npc is detected
create mgpTarget variable if it doesnt exist (default: 400000)
start a timer if it hasn't been started yet

Action.TextAuraExpression: NPC: ${var:lastNpc}, Fee: ${numeric:${var:mgpFee}} Last Card Won: ${var:mgpCardName} (${var:mgpCardPrice} MGP) Started at ${func:format(System.Double,"#,##0"):${numeric:(${var:mgpInitial})}} MGP Gained: ${func:format(System.Double,"#,##0"):${numeric:(${var:mgpGained})}} MGP in (${func:padleft(48,2):${numeric:floor(${numeric:(${_systemtimems}-${var:startTime})/1000}/3600)%24}}:${func:padleft(48,2):${numeric:floor(${numeric:(${_systemtimems}-${var:startTime})/1000}%3600/60)}}:${func:padleft(48,2):${numeric:floor(${numeric:(${_systemtimems}-${var:startTime})/1000}%3600%60)}}) ${func:format(System.Double,"0.0000"):${numeric:1000*(${var:mgpGained})/(${_systemtimems}-${var:startTime})}} MGP/s Progress: ${func:format(System.Double,"#,##0"):${numeric:(${var:mgpInitial})+(${var:mgpGained})}} / ${func:format(System.Double,"#,##0"):${var:mgpTarget}} MGP (${func:format(System.Double,"0.00"):${numeric:((${var:mgpInitial})+(${var:mgpGained}))/${var:mgpTarget}*100}}%) MGP Needed: ${func:format(System.Double,"#,##0"):${numeric:${var:mgpTarget}-((${var:mgpInitial})+(${var:mgpGained}))}} MGP Finishing in: ${numeric:floor(((${var:mgpTarget}-((${var:mgpInitial})+(${var:mgpGained})))/(1000*(${var:mgpGained})/(${_systemtimems}-${var:startTime})))/86400)}d ${func:padleft(48,2):${numeric:floor(((${var:mgpTarget}-((${var:mgpInitial})+(${var:mgpGained})))/(1000*(${var:mgpGained})/(${_systemtimems}-${var:startTime})))/3600)%24}}:${func:padleft(48,2):${numeric:floor(((${var:mgpTarget}-((${var:mgpInitial})+(${var:mgpGained})))/(1000*(${var:mgpGained})/(${_systemtimems}-${var:startTime})))%3600/60)}}:${func:padleft(48,2):${numeric:floor(((${var:mgpTarget}-((${var:mgpInitial})+(${var:mgpGained})))/(1000*(${var:mgpGained})/(${_systemtimems}-${var:startTime})))%3600%60)}}

Trigger.Name: leve
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<AA>The Mountain Steeped accepted)|(?<BB>The delivery included one or more HQ items)|(?<CC>You obtain .* gil)

Trigger.Name: Auto Gatherer
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<x>You finish logging.|You finish mining.|You finish quarrying.|You finish harvesting.|You use Aetheromatic Auger.||)|(?<y>You begin mining\.|You begin quarrying\.|You begin harvesting.|You begin logging.|You use King's Yield II\.|You use Blessed Harvest II.||)|(?<z>You obtain |)

Action.Description: Send keycode (69) "E" to window (Final Fantasy XIV)
Send keycode (219) "[" to window (Final Fantasy XIV)
Asuming condition is met, send keycode (96) "Numpad0" to window (FINAL FANTASY XIV)
